title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5, Setting a New Benchmark in Multi-modal Understanding
description: The new model introduces a 'thinking mode' for more complex problem-solving and integrates text, image, and voice processing. Benchmarks show a 40% improvement over GPT-4 in handling complex reasoning tasks

title: Google DeepMind Achieves Breakthrough in Protein Folding
The Ethical Dilemmas of Autonomous AI Agents
